text: Soni iyyoyopeyo tuntesile ŵanganyammwe kuŵa nkutula wachilikati kuti m'be mboni pa ŵandu, nombenajo Ntenga (Muhammadi ﷺ) aŵe mboni pa jamanja, ninganitukutenda ku chibula (cha Baitul Muqaddas) kwamwaliji nkulola, ikaŵeje kuti tummanyukule mundu jwaakunkuya Ntenga pakunnekanganya nimundu jwaakugalauchila ku indende yakwe, soni chisimu chene (yagalausya chibulayo) yaliji yakusausya kwekulungwa nnope ikaŵeje kwa ŵandu ŵaŵajongwele Allah, ninganaŵa Allah jwanti nikonanga chikulupi chenu (pa swala syenu sim'bele n'di nkuswali pakulola ku Baitul Muqaddas), chisimu Allah kwa ŵandu ni Mpole kusyene, Jwachanasa channope
